entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
